name: It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year
name_original: It's the Most Wonderful Time of the Year
description:
A Playable holiday music video
by virtual indie band OFK

Decorate Debug the Cat. Go wild. Thrive.

FOR MORE

Listen to the song and more music!

Play our origin story now on Steam

Say hi on Twitter, TikTok... everywhere?

CREDITS

Performed by OFK

produced & mixed by DAJAUN MARTINEAU

mastered by JETT GALINDO

written by EDWARD POLA & GEORGE WYLE

vocals by TEDDY DIEF

art direction by NAFISAH TUNG

art & animation work by JENNY YU, DEVON BEASLEY, ELORA PAUTRAT, CHELSEA HASH

game by TEDDY DIEF

dev support by TYLER J. HUTCHISON

song released with SONY MUSIC MASTERWORKS
